questions.question_text: Which HR Integrations module is used to document the URL, basic integration properties, and inbound and outbound username and password information for a third-party application?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
HR Implementation ebook page 172

questions.question_text: How can a PDF document on an active HR case be generated? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
HR Professional is case Assigned to. So only D.

Selected Answer: AD
Correct answers: A, D
HR Fundamentals - Vancouver, p. 120 - Documents can be generated Automatically by the system or by an HR professional.

Selected Answer: AD
Correct answer is A and D.

choices.A: This ensures that HR has control over further HR configurations.
choices.D: It is not necessary because the system Admin always has access to all HR data.
choices.B: The HR Admin role should remain a part of the system Admin role.
choices.C: This ensures that confidential HR data is only accessible to users with an HR role.

questions.question_text: What are the advantages of removing the HR Admin role from the system Admin role after the HR Implementation tasks have been completed? (Choose two.)
After configuration on a Lifecycle Event is complete, what additional configuration is needed to initiate the LE process for an employee?

choices.D: An HR Service is needed to initiate the LE process
choices.C: A Scheduled Job is needed to initiate the LE process
choices.A: None. The LE will automatically trigger based on its configuration
choices.B: An Event is needed to initiate the LE process

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Page 90 of HR Implementation - Tokyo:
Remember, an HR Service is needed to initiate the Lifecycle Event.

page 79 of Tokyo implementation guide "4. Create HR Service which will initiate the Lifecycle event"
D is correct

Selected Answer: D
D is correct
Correct answer is D: HR Service is needed...
D "An HR Service is needed to initiate the LE process" seem to be correct.

Selected Answer: D
Correct Answer should be "HR Service"

choices.C: Legal Holds may be placed on either a Document Type or an individual employee’s HR Profile
choices.B: Legal Holds may be placed on a group of HR profiles
choices.D: Legal Holds may be manually placed on individual employee documents
choices.A: Legal Holds are permanent and cannot be removed

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
HR Implementation ebook page 138: Legal Holds may be placed on an entire Document Type or on an employee's HR Profile to prevent documents from being edited or purged
